attributes.action: allow bicycles on trains at rush hour!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have tried on numerous occasions to leave my car at home, get the train to work and cycle home.  However on getting to the station I am told that i am not allowed to take my bike on the train.  i thought that we were supposed to be encouraged to leave our cars at home and take the train or alternative methods of transport...how can I when I am refused!!!  I want wither a return of the old guards carriage where people used to be able to take their bikes or being allowed to take our bikes on trains whenever and wherever we are!!!!
